NewsArticle.Title: Andor Updates
NewsArticle.Content: Andor Updates *Andor Queen: Increased EXP/AP reward *Andor King: Increased EXP?AP reward *Completely removed ability drain from all monsters *Monster drop rates increased for all items *Group members will now have a chance to receive King & Queen's Andor Chest *Both Andor Chests will give you the option to receive Items, Gold or EXP/AP *Once the Queen is killed, everyone in the group will be ported out
